text: after being pampered by multiple dispatch, it is really a pain to implement things in python and you have no power to just leave it to the dispatcher to call the right function based on the data type :thinking_face:

text: there is a MD package but it only offers you the control flow no performance or anything. That said - why are you using python?

text: I wish there was an oasis company that used Julia and was hiring for it. Its just rare as hell...

text: I got to make a job desc. for a role the other day and added Julia but the truth is... They will be using exclusively python. Julia just shows they can learn python :disappointed:

text: it will take a matter of time for great tech to sink in. Linux/FreeBSD/X-windows have been there for a while but DOS/Windows rule the kingdom. i was happy java is no longer hot language in industry but replaced by python which is not a great language too. the industry always adopt the more popular over technically superior one.
